sentences: Karl Leister (born 15 June 1937) is a classical clarinet player from Wilhelmshaven, Germany.
In 1959, Leister joined the Berlin Philharmonic Orchestra under the baton of Herbert von Karajan; this eminently productive musical association was to last for thirty years.
From 1993 to 2002, Leister held the position of Professor at the Hochschule f√ºr Musik "Hanns Eisler" in Berlin.
